<<<<<<< HEAD
Epistola Thomæ Hobbes Malmsburiensis ad dominum Antonium à Wood authoreum Historie & antiquitatum Vniversitatis Oxoniensis, inserenda ad pag. 344, 345 Hobbes, Thomas, 1588-1679.
1 broadside.
s.n., [London : 1674]
Dated at end: Londini Apr. 20, 1674. Place and date of publication suggested by NUC pre-1956 imprints. "The broadside is Hobbes' enraged response to Dr. Fell's tampering with his biography in Anthony à Wood's History"--Note of bookseller, Stonehill. (NUC pre-1956 imprints.) Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
=======
